description:
Trusted by athletes for more than 2 decades, Body Glide For Her™ helps your skin retain its natural moisture. It uses the original anti-chafing formula and blends in coconut and sweet almond oils. Use it anywhere hot-spots, blisters or chafing are an issue: a 10K run, poker ride or for breaking in new shoes.

  • Stick application is fast and clean to apply
  • Hypoallergenic and has no animal by-products or been tested on animals. Vegan approved
  • Base ingredients for each Body Glide product: caprylic/capric triglyceride (plant derived), cetearyl alcohol (plant derived), ozokerite wax, glyceryl behenate, stearyl alcohol (plant derived), allantoin (comfrey root derived), tocopherol (vitamin E based antioxidant)
  • Made with plant derived waxes, so store your Body Glide products at 15-30°C (59-86F)
name: Body Glide Original Anti-Chafe Balm 10g
